name: Union of the Third Path
oracle_text: Draw a card, then you gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: Terisia City at last opened its ivory towers to all who sought respite from the endless war.

name: Fauna Shaman
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a creature card: Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "I call upon both predators and protector, for now is a season of war."

name: "Last March of the Ents"
oracle_text: Create X green Forest Dryad land creature tokens.

name: "Last March of the Ents"
oracle_text: Create X green Forest Dryad land creature tokens.

name: Draconic Destiny
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has flying, haste, and "{1}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn." It'sa dragon in addition to its other types.
When enchanted creature dies, return Draconic Destiny to its owner's hand.

name: "Crucible Behemoth"
oracle_text:
You may play land cards from your graveyard.
Unearth {G}{G} ({G}{G}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)

name: Gruesome Realization
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• You draw two cards and you lose 2l ife.
• Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Mishra was gone—all that remained was a machine wearing his face.

name: Urza's Workshop
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
Metalcraft — {T}: Add {C} for each Urza's land you control. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.
flavor_text: Urza eventually came to understand Tocasia's lessons on clarity of purpose. Perfection became his goal, and all other matters fell away in its pursuit.

name: "Tethered Wayfarer"
oracle_text:
Bladewhip Transmogrant can't block.
{4}{B}{B}: Return Bladewhip Transmogrant from your graveyard to the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it. This ability costs {4} less to activate if an opponent controls four or more nonbasic lands.

name: Take Flight
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has flying and "Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card."
flavor_text: Though neithr brother cared to admit it, flying the ancient thopter was their last happy moment together.

name: Ambush Paratrooper
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
{5}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "It would be folly to fight a dragon engine head-on. Let's hit it from above."

name: Evangel of Synthesis
oracle_text:
When Evangel of Synthesis enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
As long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn, Evangel of Synthesis gets +1/+0 and has menace.

name: Wasteful Harvest
oracle_text: Mill five cards. You may put a permanent card from among hte cards milled this way into your hand. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)
flavor_text: Once the brothres discovered the pristine island of Argoth, the war came down to who could plunder it faster.

name: Gnawing Vermin
oracle_text:
When Gnawing Vermin enters the battlefield, target player mills two cards.
When Gnawing Vermin dies, target creature you don't control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Everyone warns about the sand and the food, but the rats are worse than both put together!"
—Samwell, letter to his family

name: Hero of the Dunes
oracle_text:
When Hero of the Dunes enters the battlefield, return target artifact or creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Creatures you control with mana value 3 or less get +1/+0.
flavor_text: History forgot her name but not her victories.

name: Argivian Avenger
oracle_text: {1}: Until end of turn, Argivian Avenger gets -1/-1 and gains your choice of flying, vigilance, deathtouch, or haste.
flavor_text: Unable to settle on just one versatile being, Urza decided to create myriad adaptable machines.

name: Goblin Blast-Runner
oracle_text: Goblin Blast-Runner gets +2/+0 and has menace as long as you sacrificed a permanent this turn.
flavor_text: Most goblins can light a fuse and run, but only the cleverest remember to drop the bomb.

name: Transmogrant Altar
oracle_text:
{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Add {C}{C}{C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Create a 3/3 colorless Zombie artifact creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

name: "Yard Sale"
oracle_text: Choose target artifact or creature you control. You draw cards equal to its mana value. An opponent gains control of that permanent.

name: Power Plant Worker
oracle_text: {3}: Power Plant Worker gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you control creatures named Mine Worker and Tower Worker, put two +1/+1 counters on Power Plant Worker instead. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text: Mechanical workers toiled away, tirelessly fueling the impossible.

name: Mass Production
oracle_text: Create four 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature tokens.
flavor_text:
"I need an army, not a masterpiece. Accelerate output, whatever it takes."
—Urza, notes to his engineers

name: "Rapid Assembly"
oracle_text: {3}{R}: You may put an artifact card from your hand onto the battlefield. It gains haste. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Levitating Statue
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Levitating Statue.
{2}: Levitating Statue becmoes a 1/1 Construct artifact creature until end of turn.

name: Autonomous Assembler
oracle_text:
Prototype {1}{W} — 2/2 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Vigilance
{1}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target Assembly-Worker you control.

name: Iron-Craw Crusher
oracle_text:
Prototype {2}{G}{G} — 2/5 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)
Whenever Iron Craw Crusher attacks, target attacking creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Iron-Craw Crusher's power.

name: "Slag Belcher"
oracle_text:
Trample
Players can't gain life.

name: Over the Top
oracle_text: Each player reveals a number of cards from the top of their library equal to the number of nonland permanent they control, puts all permanent cards revealed that way onto the battlefield, and puts the rest into their graveyard.

name: Myrel, Shield of Argive
oracle_text:
During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.
Whenever Myrel, Shield of Argive attacks, create X 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature tokens, where X is the number of Soldiers you control.

name: Loran, Disciple of History
oracle_text: Whenever Loran, Disciple of History or another legendary creature enters the battlefield under your control, return target artifact from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Urza and Mishra may have been Tocasia's most famous students, but Loran was the true heir to her legacy.

name: Thopter Architect
oracle_text: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "She'll only fly once. Make it count!"

name: Fallaji Archaeologist
oracle_text: When Fallaji Archaeologist enters the battlefield, mill three cards. You may put a noncreature, nonland card from among the cards milled this way into your hand. If you don't, put a +1/+1 counter on Fallaji Archaeologist. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)

name: Forging the Anchor
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal any number of artifact cards from among htem and put the revealed cards into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: The metal turned and blossomed with Saheeli's will, each filigreed twist bringing the temporal anchor closer to completion.

name: Mightstone's Animation
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact
When Mightstone's Animation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 4/4 in addition to its other types.

name: Lat-Nam Adept
oracle_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Lat-Nam Adept.

name: Urza's Rebuff
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell.
• Tap up to two target creatures.
flavor_text:
"As usual, my brother's maneuvers are brash and impulsive."
—Urza

name: Ashnod, Flesh Mechanist
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Ashnod, Flesh Mechanist attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, create a tapped Powerstone token.
{5}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a tapped 3/3 colorless Zombie artifact creature token.

name: Ashnod's Intervention
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gets +2/+0 and gains "When this creature dies or is put into an exile from the battlefield, return it to its owner's hand."
flavor_text: "Listen, Duck. Gix is everywhere, playing every side. Mishra won't listen . . . but perhaps Urza will."

name: Diabolic Intent
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Gix pierced his disciples' minds and savored their experiences as he took in their knowledge.

name: Disciples of Gix
oracle_text: When Disciples of Gix enters the battlefield, search your library for up to three artifact cards, put them into your graveyard, then shuffle.
flavor_text: "Machines fel no fear, no sorrow, no hunger—only glorious purpose, true and pure."

name: Gix's Caress
oracle_text:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")
flavor_text: "Show me all the delicious misery you've sown."

name: Gix's Command
oracle_text:
Choose two —
• Put two +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature. It gains lifelink until end of turn.
• Destroy each creature with power 2 or less.
• Return up to two creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
• Each opponent sacrifices a creature with the highest power among creatures they control.

name: No One Left Behind
oracle_text:
This spell costs {3} less to cast if it targets a creature card with mana value 3 or less.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Dying for the cause is overrated.

name: Painful Quandary
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, that player loses 5 life unless they discard a card.
flavor_text: In Mishra's desperation to destroy his brother, he allowed Gix to destroy him instead.

name: Powerstone Fracture
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Move! When the powerstone blows, that behemoth will be nothing but a hole in the ground."
—Ashnod, to Hajar

name: Thran Vigil
oracle_text: Whenever one or more artifact and/or creature cards leave your graveyard during your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Glacian built his automatons to last, and last they did, beyond even the Thran themselves.

name: Fallaji Chaindancer
oracle_text: {2}: Fallaji Chaindancer gains double strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: She was eager to show the invading Yotians how she earned her nickname, "The Sandstorm of Tomakul."

name: Mishra's Onslaught
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create two 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Hah. Urza has underestimated my strength yet again."
—Mishra

name: Mishra's Domination
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
As long as you control enchanted creature, it gets +2/+2. Otherwise, it can't block.
flavor_text: Power radiated from the Weakstone, binding the dragon engine to Mishra's command.

name: Obliterating Bolt
oracle_text: Obliterating Bolt deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswlker. If that creature or planeswalker would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: In desperation, Pero called on his memory of a lightning storm that nearly killed his family. When he opened his eyes, only smoke and dust remained.
